DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect concomitant administration prednisolone use clomiphene citrate ( CC ) induction ovulation infertile lean woman CC resistant polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Adding Prednisolone During Ovulation Induction With CC Lean Women With CC Resistant PCOS
DOC.detailed_description: Women randomly divide two group ; CC-Prednisolone group CC group . Women CC-Prednisolone group receive CC ( 150 mg/day 5 consecutive day day 2 cycle ) prednisolone ( 5 mg/day 10 consecutive day day 2 cycle ) . Women CC group receive CC alone ( 150 mg/day 5 consecutive day day 2 cycle ) . Transvaginal sonography ( TVS ) scan perform regularly monitor follicular growth ( folliculometry ) ; start day 10 stimulation cycle repeat every 2-3 day . When least one follicle ≥ 18 mm diameter , final oocyte maturation induce intramuscular administration 10000 IU human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) time intercourse advise . If follicle ≥ 12 mm day 16 cycle , monitor follicular growth discontinue cycle presumed anovulatory . Ovulation document TVS scan one week trigger oocyte maturation confirm assess midluteal serum progesterone level . Each woman subject ovarian stimulation maximum 3 consecutive cycle except get pregnant first second cycle
DOC.criteria: Infertile lean woman PCOS define Rotterdam criterion . CC resistance ( defined failure ovulation receive 150 mg/day CC 5 consecutive day per cycle , least 3 consecutive cycle ) . Age < 20 > 35 year . Body mass index ( BMI ) < 18.5 kg/m2 > 25 kg/m2 . Presence infertility factor anovulatory PCOS . Previous history ovarian surgery surgical removal one ovary . Previous exposure cytotoxic drug pelvic irradiation . Oral hypoglycemic hormonal therapy either currently precede 3 month . Metabolic hormonal abnormality
